verbs.description: [ARG0: suicide blast] [V: kills] [ARG1: three] [ARGM-LOC: near prison in afghan capital] a suicide bomber blew himself up near the gate of afghanistan largest prison on wednesday killing at least three people and wounding three officials said but there was no immediate claim of responsibility afghanistan official najib danish interior ministry kabul taliban prison pul - e - charkhi microsoft
